concept.title: CMM support for LI field debugging enhancements - phase 1 (Feature f10326-01)
concept.shortdesc: This feature allows trusted members of the 3LS/4LS team to gather necessary data for effective and efficient diagnosis of lawful interception field issues.

conbody.p: The usage of this feature is targeted to trusted 3LS/4LS member.
This feature introduces the possibility to activate lawful interception area debug logging with liconf command for troubleshooting purposes.
